title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: The"Witches' Knowe" is still pointed out as a moundon the top of a hill, where they were supposed tohold their gatherings; and many still remember anold woman who dressed in a very fantastic style,and was accredited with supernatural power.
